Package com.advertisementproject.zuulgateway.messagebroker.listener

Class MessageListener

java.lang.Object
com.advertisementproject.zuulgateway.messagebroker.listener.MessageListener
@Service
public class MessageListener
extends java.lang.Object
MessageListener is a service that listens for messages from other microservices via RabbitMQ and then performs appropriate actions for the messages received. When a message is sent to the listed queue, the message is received, logged and handled in the listener method with the help of UserService and PermissionsService.

  • Method Details

    • userListener

      @RabbitListener(queues="#{userQueue.name}") public void userListener​(java.lang.String messageObject) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Listens for messages from User Service application that a user should be added or updated
      Parameters:
      messageObject - the user to be created or updated, in JSON string format
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if messageObject cannot be read as a user object

    • userDeleteListener

      @RabbitListener(queues="#{userDeleteQueue.name}") public void userDeleteListener​(java.util.UUID userId)
      Listens for messages from User Service application that a user should be deleted
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id of the user to be deleted

    • permissionsListener

      @RabbitListener(queues="#{permissionQueue.name}") public void permissionsListener​(java.lang.String messageObject) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Listens for messages from Permission Service application that a permission entity should be added or updated
      Parameters:
      messageObject - the permission to be created or updated, in JSON string format
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if messageObject cannot be read as a permission object

    • permissionsDeleteListener

      @RabbitListener(queues="#{permissionDeleteQueue.name}") public void permissionsDeleteListener​(java.util.UUID userId)
      Listens for messages from Permission Service application that a permissions entity should be deleted
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id of the permission entity to be deleted
